welcome to platinum hostel, bomso

Experience Comfort and Convenience at Platinum Hostel, Bomso!

about us

Welcome to Platinum Hostel, Bomso! Located in the heart of Bomso, our branch is the closest to campus, ensuring convenience and easy access for college students. As the largest of all three branches, we offer spacious and comfortable accommodations with three room types to choose from. In addition, we take pride in our extensive facilities, including a fully equipped gym, basketball court, and a game room. At Platinum Hostel, Bomso, we are committed to providing an exceptional living experience that combines comfort, convenience, and a vibrant community.

rooms

1 in a room

Experience comfort and convenience in our cozy one-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Bomso. Equipped with amenities such as WiFi, air conditioning, DSTV cable, and a refreshing shower, this room offers a private and tranquil space for focused studying and relaxation.

2 in a room

Share the college journey with a friend or roommate in our spacious two-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Bomso. Stay connected with WiFi, enjoy a cool environment with air conditioning, catch up on your favorite shows with DSTV cable, and refresh yourself in the convenience of a private shower.

3 in a room

Foster a vibrant and inclusive community atmosphere in our three-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Bomso. This room type offers a sociable living experience with fellow students while providing essential amenities like WiFi, air conditioning, DSTV cable, and a dedicated shower area for your comfort.

amenites and facilities

air conditioning

Stay cool and comfortable in our air-conditioned rooms.

comfortable beds

Enjoy a restful sleep in our cozy and comfortable beds.

free WIFI

Stay connected with complimentary high-speed WiFi throughout the hostel.

DSTV cable

Relax and unwind with a wide range of entertainment options on DSTV cable.

gym

Stay fit and active in our fully equipped gym.

parking lot

Conveniently park your vehicle in our secure parking lot.

back-up generator

Stay powered up with our reliable standby generator.

well-stocked supermarket

Access a variety of essentials and snacks at our on-site well-stocked supermarket.

housekeeping

Experience a clean and tidy environment with our regular housekeeping services.
